name: Orb's Dark Hacker News v1.2
description: Custom and COMPLETE conversion of YCombinator's Hacker News aggregation site into a subtle and "easy on the eyes" dark version.  I tried to keep it mostly identical to the original site, but with slight size/DPI increases to some elements and color emphasis added to the most important functionalities of the site.
additional_info:
v1.2 (Jan 17, 2020)
Fixed various unhandled 'a' link styles
Added unique :hover styles for all links
Added better styles for form elements (textarea, input, etc)
Emphasized colors for certain unique links
Added bold styling for currently selected menu item/page location
Changed sizes from px to em in various places where appropriate

v1.1 (Dec 5, 2018)
Color emphasis added to "Comments / Discuss" links
Subtle color emphasis added to link domain
Full support for all sub pages like your profile page, submit page, etc
